title: Memphis Grizzlies
content:
Thinking this might be custom, but looking for something that matches "Memphis" and "Grizzlies" as well as maybe the inlined numbers. Don't need to know the lower case solid letters. Any help is appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Grizzlies.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204033315/http:/typophile.com/files/Grizzlies.png) | 63.27 KB |
author: elias_stein

comments.content:
Sports teams often have custom fonts and I believe this is the case here.  
You might be able to tinker with an existing font to get something similar.  
Some possibilities Inline Lettering JNL [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inline-lettering/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204033315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inline-lettering/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inline-lettering/") ARB 66 Neon [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/arb-66-neon-block-jun-37-cas/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204033315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/arb-66-neon-block-jun-37-cas/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/arb-66-neon-block-jun-37-cas/") Deerfield [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/deerfield/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204033315/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/deerfield/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/deerfield/")  
Don
